Alert Name: bush
Congress, White House strike trade deal
Pelosi says accord will put labor, environmental standards at core of international trade agreements.
05/10/07 07:24 PM, EDT
The Bush administration and Congress have reached a bipartisan deal aimed at creating a free and fair trade policy by putting labor and environmental standards at the core of international trade agreements, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi said Thursday.
